original_title: Kurt Josef Wagle og mordmysteriet på Hurtigruta
overview: The crazy fisher man Kurt Josef, an early pensioner, and his odd musical friend Rock Fjellstad has landed a job at Hurtigruta, only to discover that someone has killed off a famous artist, the former M2M-member Marion Ravn.
title: Kurt Josef Wagle og mordmysteriet på Hurtigruta
